name: Meet me there
description:
Game Name Meet me there

How was Houdini used in your game's development?
I used Houdini to generate level from presets, generate some textures, create particles effects and create sound effects for player and environment.

Besides Houdini, what other tools did you use and what did you use them for?
Blender to create horse an well dummies.

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
Houses and trees presets, Grass pictures, music from freesound.org.
